data.question: You’re really busy at work and a colleague is telling you their life story and personal woes. You:

options.option: A: Don’t dare to interrupt them
B: Think it’s more important to give them some of your time; work can wait
C: Listen, but with only with half an ear
D: Interrupt and explain that you are really busy at the moment

data.question: You’ve been sitting in the doctor’s waiting room for more than 25 minutes. You:

options.option: A: Look at your watch every two minutes
B: Bubble with inner anger, but keep quiet
C: Explain to other equally impatient people in the room that the doctor is always running late
D: Complain in a loud voice, while tapping your foot impatiently

data.question: You’re having an animated discussion with a colleague regarding a project that you’re in charge of. You:

options.option: B: Think that they are obviously right
C: Defend your own point of view, tooth and nail
